name: xorg-server
purpose: is the graphical server.

name: xorg-xwininfo
purpose: allows querying information about windows.

name: xorg-xinit
purpose: starts the graphical server.

name: arandr
purpose: is a UI for screen adjustment.

name: xcompmgr
purpose: is for transparency and removing screen-tearing.

name: xorg-xprop
purpose: is a tool for detecting window properties.

name: dosfstools
purpose: allows your computer to access dos-like filesystems.

name: libnotify
purpose: allows desktop notifications.

name: dunst
purpose: is a suckless notification system.

name: exfat-utils
purpose: allows management of FAT drives.

name: xwallpaper
purpose: sets the wallpaper.

name: ffmpeg
purpose: can record and splice video and audio on the command line.

name: gnome-keyring
purpose: serves as the system keyring.

name: mpd
purpose: is a lightweight music daemon.

name: mpc
purpose: is a terminal interface for mpd.

name: mpv
purpose: is the patrician's choice video player.

name: man-db
purpose: lets you read man pages of programs.

name: ncmpcpp
purpose: a ncurses interface for music with multiple formats and a powerful tag editor.

name: noto-fonts-emoji
purpose: is an emoji font.

name: ntfs-3g
purpose: allows accessing NTFS partitions.

name: pulseaudio-alsa
purpose: is the audio system.

name: pulsemixer
purpose: is an audio controler.

name: pamixer
purpose: is a command-line audio interface.

name: maim
purpose: can take quick screenshots at your request.

name: unclutter
purpose: hides an inactive mouse.

name: unrar
purpose: extracts rar's.

name: unzip
purpose: unzips zips.

name: xcape
purpose: gives the special escape/super mappings of LARBS.

name: xclip
purpose: allows for copying and pasting from the command line.

name: xdotool
purpose: provides window action utilities on the command line.

name: xorg-xdpyinfo
purpose: aids with resolution determination and screen recording.

name: youtube-dl
purpose: can download any YouTube video (or playlist or channel) when given the link.

name: mediainfo
purpose: shows audio and video information.

name: xorg-xbacklight
purpose: enables changing screen brightness levels.

name: zsh-fast-syntax-highlighting
purpose: provides syntax highlighting in the shell.

name: task-spooler
purpose: queues commands or files for download.

name: simple-mtpfs-git
purpose: enables the mounting of cell phones.

name: https://github.com/utkarsh181/dwmblocks
purpose: serves as the modular status bar.

name: https://github.com/utkarsh181/dmenu
purpose: runs commands and provides a UI for selection.

name: https://github.com/utkarsh181/st
purpose: is my custom build of suckless's terminal emulator.

name: https://github.com/utkarsh181/dwm
purpose: is the window manager.

name: slock
purpose: allows you to lock your computer, and quickly unlock with your password.
